trans-unit.source: Provides data for several of the events that are associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Stylus"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para vários eventos que estão associados a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Stylus"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The StylusEventArgs class provides data for the following events: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusUp> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusInAirMove> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusEnter> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusLeave> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusInRange> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusOutOfRange> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotStylusCapture> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostStylusCapture> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusUp> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusMove> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusInAirMove> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusInRange> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusOutOfRange> (as well as equivalent events declared on the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> class).
trans-unit.target: A classe StylusEventArgs fornece dados para os seguintes eventos:- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusUp>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusInAirMove>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusEnter>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusLeave>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusInRange>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusOutOfRange>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotStylusCapture>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostStylusCapture>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusUp>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusMove>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusInAirMove>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusInRange>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusOutOfRange>(bem como equivalentes eventos declarados no <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>classe).</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusOutOfRange> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusInRange> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusInAirMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewStylusUp> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostStylusCapture> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotStylusCapture> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusOutOfRange> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusInRange> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusLeave> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusEnter> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusInAirMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusUp>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The stylus to associate with the event.
trans-unit.target: A caneta para associar o evento.

trans-unit.source: The time when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: A hora quando o evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a posição da caneta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> that the (`x`,`y`) coordinates are mapped to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> que o (`x`,`y`) coordenadas são mapeadas para.

trans-unit.source: A that represents the position of the stylus, based on the coordinates of relativeTo.
trans-unit.target: Um que representa a posição da caneta, com base nas coordenadas do relativeTo .

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects relative to the specified input element.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> que contém <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos em relação ao elemento de entrada especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> to which the (`x,y`) coordinates in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> are mapped.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> ao qual o (`x,y`) coordena no <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> são mapeados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects collected in the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> que contém <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos coletadas no evento.

trans-unit.source: relativeTo is neither or .
trans-unit.target: relativeTois neither or .

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that uses the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> and contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects relating to the specified input element.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> que usa especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"> </xref> e contém <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos relacionados ao elemento de entrada especificado.

trans-unit.source: `subsetToReformatTo` must be compatible with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29> method.
trans-unit.target: `subsetToReformatTo`deve ser compatível com o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>do <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29>método.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%28System.Windows.IInputElement%29> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A> method to get a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> before calling the GetStylusPoints method.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>método para obter um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>antes de chamar o método GetStylusPoints.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription.GetCommonDescription%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > GetStylusPoints uses constraints from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs>, even if the constraints in `subsetToReformatTo` are different.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > GetStylusPoints usa restrições do <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>em <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs>, mesmo se as restrições em `subsetToReformatTo` são diferentes.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `subsetToReformatTo` uses <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure> values of 0 and 1023 but <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs> uses values of 0 and 255, GetStylusPoints returns a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> containing the values 0 and 255.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se `subsetToReformatTo` usa <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>valores de 0 a 1023 mas <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs>usa valores de 0 e 255, GetStylusPoints retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription>que contém os valores 0 e 255.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperties.NormalPressure>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> to which the (`x,y`) coordinates in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> are mapped.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref> ao qual o (`x,y`) coordena no <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> são mapeados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to be used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointDescription"></xref> to be used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects collected during an event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection"> </xref> que contém <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> objetos coletados durante um evento.

trans-unit.source: relativeTo is neither or .
trans-unit.target: relativeTois neither or .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the stylus is in proximity to, but not touching, the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a caneta está em proximidade, mas não tocar o digitalizador.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the stylus is in proximity to, but not touching, the digitizer; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a caneta está no proximidade, mas não tocar o digitalizador; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the stylus in inverted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a caneta em invertido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the stylus is inverted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a caneta é invertida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Invoca manipuladores de eventos de uma maneira de um tipo específico, que pode aumentar a eficiência do sistema de eventos.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Essa implementação converte o manipulador genérico como um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventHandler>e, em seguida, invoca o proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre esse padrão de implementação e os motivos para ele, consulte <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>e [visão geral sobre eventos roteados](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador genérico para chamar em uma forma de um tipo específico.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: O destino para chamar o manipulador no.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref> that represents the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref> que representa a caneta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref> that represents the stylus.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref> que representa a caneta.
